recap_documents.description: NOTICE OF FILING OF OFFICIAL TRANSCRIPT of Trial Proceedings held on 9/27/10 - Morning Session before Judge Leonard Davis. Court Reporters: Shea Sloan/Shelly Holmes, shea_sloan@txed.uscourts.gov. 131 pages. NOTICE RE REDACTION OF TRANSCRIPTS: The parties have seven (7) business days to file with the Court a Notice of Intent to Request Redaction of this transcript. If no such Notice is filed, the transcript will be made remotely electronically available to the public without redaction after 90 calendar days. The policy is located on our website at www.txed.uscourts.gov Transcript may be viewed at the court public terminal or purchased through the Court Reporter/Transcriber before the deadline for Release of Transcript Restriction. After that date it may be obtained through PACER.. Redaction Request due 11/15/2010. Redacted Transcript Deadline set for 11/26/2010. Release of Transcript Restriction set for 1/21/2011. (sms, ) (Entered: 10/20/2010)
